price: (26) And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt [i.e., praise] Him a long [part of the] night.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbiḥ'hu laylan ṭawīlan
